title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: goal LGPclassifiers classify RNAseq samples according DLBCL cell origin disease classifiers

title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: can install latest released version LGPclassifiers like : can install dev version:

title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: basic example shows generate Reddy COO classifications matrix samples first normalizing sample tpm counts, calculating sample COO classifications comparing normalized reference
code: library(LGPclassifiers)  # Get example query matrix # rna.counts <- readRDS("/stash/results/dev/kyriakoc/DLBCL/forManuel/rna.counts.rds") # query <- rna.counts$NDMER  # Run single sample normalization function based on housekeeping genes query.st <- ss.normalize(query)  # Run Reddy COO classifier on normalized samples subType <- ssREFERENCE(query.st)

what: LGPclassifiers: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort — LGPclassifiers-package
title: LGPclassifiers: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort — LGPclassifiers-package
text: Classifiers LGP Cohort. Includes Reddy Cell Origin single-sample classifier.

what: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
text: Normalize tpm sample counts based housekeeping gene levels

title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
code: ss.normalize(   tpm.mat,   id2geneName = geneName.map,   collapse = TRUE,   featureType = "gene",   ref.mean = NULL,   ref.sd = NULL,   target = NULL,   houseKeeping = c("ISY1", "R3HDM1", "TRIM56", "UBXN4", "WDR55"),   toScale = FALSE )

title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
text: tpm.mat matrix input samples (values must TPM, one row per transcript/gene id) id2geneName data frame mapping Ensembl gene ids/transcript ids gene names (provided internal package data) collapse T/F whether collapse transcripts gene level (default T) featureType either "gene" "transcript" (default "gene") ref.mean, ref.sd reference gene means standard deviations target target houseKeeping vector housekeeping genes normalize (ISY1, R3HDM1, TRIM56, UBXN4, WDR55) toScale T/F whether scale (default F)

what: Classify sample COO using Reddy algorithm — ssREFERENCE
title: Classify sample COO using Reddy algorithm — ssREFERENCE
text: Classify sample COO GCB-like ABC-like. Note method uses reference dataset classifies sample relative reference

title: Classify sample COO using Reddy algorithm — ssREFERENCE
Classify sample COO using Reddy algorithm — ssREFERENCE
text: query matrix normalized query gene/transcript counts sample reference.mean vector reference means (provided package data) reference.sd vector reference standard deviations (provided package data)
